resources.string: In the fast pace of modern life, it is vital to maintain physical health, health not only means the absence of disease, but also includes good physical fitness, mental state and lifestyle, and through scientific management of health data and regular recording of health indicators (such as heart rate steps) Sleep time, etc.), we can better understand their physical condition, adjust life habits in time, improve the quality of life, and find small changes in the body, take early measures, such as long-term lack of sleep may affect the immune system, and irregular heart rate may be a signal of potential health problems

Fitness can not only build muscle strength, improve heart and lung function and promote new circulation, but also effectively relieve stress, improve sleep quality, and enhance overall health. By scientifically recording exercise data (such as step count, heart rate, calorie consumption, etc.), we can more intuitively understand our own exercise, adjust training programs, improve exercise efficiency, while avoiding sports injuries, and maintain long-term health and vitality.
Import your health data, and let us do the hard work of tracking and evaluating it for you.

Whether you re looking to improve your overall health or simply stay on top of your wellness. Weâ€™ll provide insightful analysis, giving you the tools you need to make informed decisions and live your healthiest life.
Sync your fitness data effortlessly and take your workout tracking to the next level.

Our app helps you track calories burned, fitness minutes, active hours, and more offering personalized insights tailored to your fitness goals. Whether you re training for a marathon or just staying fit, we ll support you every step of the way, helping you assess progress and achieve your fitness aspirations with ease.

Health Studio is a comprehensive record app that records various data of your body and fitness. It helps you keep track of them by having users manually input your physical health data. Thus, you do not need to download multiple apps to view your various physical health data and fitness records! The mission of Health Studio is to make your life more convenient!

Welcome! New user, I know you must be confused about how to use my software. Here is an introduction to the App: On the Health page, your inputted health indicators will be displayed. On the Fitness page, your inputted fitness records will be shown. How to input the indicators or records? Just click on the indicator or record card on the Health or Fitness page to start entering your data!
